quote: Everything starts with a dream. A particle of our imagination that teases us of what the future could be like, as long as we fight for it. – Gurbaksh Chahal
fact: Icelanders consume more Coca-Cola per Capita than any other nation.
joke: Have you heard about the film "Constipation", you probably haven't because it's not out yet.
